name: Muneharu
description: When I grow up, I'll take up that horseslayer and protect Mom, and you.

passiveSkill.name: Moonlight Muneharu
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "I shall remove all obstacles on my master's path. Transforms {placeholder} of Muneharu's attack damage into true damage (ignores DEF, Block and DMG RES Rate).Lineup Skill:Activation Requirement: Have Saya in the lineup.Activation Effect: After Muneharu uses his first Unique Skill, instantly restores 500 Rage."}

uniqueSkill.name: Tempest Splitter
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Muneharu gathers wind into his blade and charges energy, restoring Rage by {placeholder} per sec. Charging ends if inflicted with Freeze, Stun or Silence. If already charging, ends charging and unleashes wind from the blade, dealing ATK*{placeholder} damage to a column of enemies."}

specialSkill.name: Aqua Sunset
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Muneharu leaps into the air and bashes the ground, dealing ATK*{placeholder} damage to an enemy. If charging, restores additional {placeholder} Rage.Skill Cast Rate:{placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Sunrise Shower
normalSkill.description: Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.
